name: World Is Food - JamGame
description:
Entry into the LibGDX 7 day  December game jam for 2019

Theme was: World is Food

Controls:

A and D to move left and right

Space to Jump

Jump while jumping leads to a double jump

You can do a double jump after you bounce of enemies

I am not very creative, so I took the theme literally.  This is a basic platformer where the World.... is Food. Like legit, its all made of food.

Game is very simple and pretty easy, didn't have time to be clever and ramp up the difficulty. Expect to complete it fairly quickly. 

Just a note, different enemies have different "bouncy-ness" Some launch you higher, this will be critical to access certain platforms.

Also, there is always the possibility of some glitch or bug since this was done under a deadline, just lemme know.

All of the Food assets came from here https://thewisehedgehog.itch.io/thfp

But i spent some time modifying them into the tileset and also adding little feets and eyeballs to all the food to make them enemies.

Parts of the background images were taken from https://glitterbabi.itch.io/desserts

Music and SFX were all found through freesound.org

Any other assets were cobbled together in paint
